import React from 'react' import './About.css'; export default function About() { return (

Welcome to Gen AI Editor

Your All-in-One AI Toolkit for Stunning Video & Photo Editing

Gen AI Editor is a next-generation platform that brings the power of Artificial Intelligence to your creative process. Whether you're an aspiring creator, an editor, or someone who just loves polishing their content, this app is built to make your work faster, smarter, and more impactful.

💡 Key Features

  • 🎥 AI Video Background Remover: Remove video backgrounds seamlessly, frame-by-frame.
  • 🧽 Object Eraser: Remove unwanted people or objects from images and videos intelligently.
  • ⚙️ Fast Rendering: Optimized processing using GPU-backed servers.
  • 🎨 Smart Enhancements: Improve lighting, sharpness, and colors using Gen AI.
  • 📁 Batch Editing: Process multiple files with ease (coming soon).

⚙️ Tech Stack

This app is built with modern tools and frameworks that ensure performance and scalability:

  • ⚛️ React.js for a fast and interactive UI
  • 🚀 FastAPI as the powerful Python backend
  • 🎞️ OpenCV and MoviePy for video frame processing
  • 🧠 PyTorch + AI models like RVM, Mask2Former, ZITS
  • 🌐 Deployed on Hugging Face Spaces with GPU acceleration

🌟 Our Mission

We aim to democratize creative tools by combining powerful AI with a simple, elegant interface. No need for bulky software or long render times—just upload, edit, and wow your audience.

Let Gen AI handle the complexity, while you focus on your vision.✨

); }
